Package views

Class DoctorView

java.lang.Object
views.DoctorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDoctorView
public class DoctorView extends Object implements IDoctorView
The DoctorView class provides a user interface for doctors to manage their operations. It allows doctors to view medical records, manage schedules, handle appointments, and more.

    • manageAvailabilityMenu

      public void manageAvailabilityMenu(User user)
      Displays the "Manage Availability" menu for a doctor.

      This method allows a doctor to manage their availability by setting dates as available or unavailable. The menu runs in a loop until the doctor chooses to return to the main menu.

      • Option 1: Set a date as available by unblocking slots.
      • Option 2: Set a date as unavailable by blocking slots.
      • Option 3: Exit the availability management menu and return to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      user - The `User` object representing the doctor managing their availability. This includes their hospital ID, which is used to retrieve the corresponding `Doctor` object.
